snippet.title: Project Code Vampire Hunter Nintendo Switch™ Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the reveal trailer for the Nintendo Switch™ Digital Software
Project Code Vampire Hunter!

"Humans and Vampires. A game with the world's fate in the balance is about to begin."


◆Summary◆
A dark fantasy about two worlds, human and demon, where solitary vampire hunters now gather to fight with the world's fate at stake.

☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨
It's official! Project Code Vampire's title is now The Red Bell's Lament. Planned for release in Spring 2025.
☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨☨

◆X（Twitter）◆
https://x.com/RedBellsLament

◆Official Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/redbell/english

◆2023 Announcement Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/newtitle2023/english/

◆X（Twitter）
https://adag.jp/Voltage_Switch_X/

◆Official Portal Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/switch/english/

◆Participating Creators◆
Director: Nachi
Scenario: Yuzuki
Illustrator: Norita
Backgrounds: Minoru Akiba
BGM: Yamato
Theme: 9mm Parabellum Bullet
